text:
I downloaded apache_2.0.59-win32-x86-openssl-0.9.7j.msi and wanted to use ab to
test an HTTPS server.

unfortunately, it crashes and windows suggests to report this error :->

If I use abs against an HTTP server it works, but against an HTTPS server it
explodes...
creator: vincent.larchet@elca.ch
wrowe@apache.org
text:
By obtaining and unpacking into the installed program files\apache group\apache2
directory the file

http://archive.apache.org/dist/httpd/binaries/win32/symbols/apache_2.0.59-win32-x86-openssl-0.9.7j-symbols.zip

and following directions about capturing the crash dump with dr. watson that are
posted at

http://httpd.apache.org/dev/debugging.html

you will greatly help isolate this error.  Providing specifics of how you
invoked ab would also help (command line options).

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
Will need at least the exact arguments, a reproduction case of what you
tried to do.  Without that, will need to close this bug.
